description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的标准时间，采用UTC+8时区，由中国科学院国家授时中心发布。
description.en: The standard time of the People's Republic of China, which is in the UTC+8 time zone and is published by the National Time Service Center.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国实际管辖的领土，不包括香港、澳门和台湾。
description.en: Refers to the territory under the actual jurisdiction of the People's Republic of China, excluding Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 一个时区，比世界协调时快8小时。
description.en: A time zone that is 8 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

description.zh-cn: 一条经线，北京时间的基准。
description.en: A line of longitude, the basis for Beijing Time.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国的标准时间的生成、保持和发播的科研机构。
description.en: A research institution responsible for the generation, maintenance, and dissemination of standard time in China.

description.zh-cn: 关于中国历史上和提议中的时区划分的概念。
description.en: The concept regarding historical and proposed time zone divisions in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期的国家天文机构。
description.en: The national astronomical institution in the early Republic of China.

en: Ministry of the Interior (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期划分的五个时区之一，为UTC+7。
description.en: One of the five time zones of the Republic of China, UTC+7.

description.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区采用的非官方时间标准，为UTC+6。
description.en: An unofficial time standard used in Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, which is UTC+6.

description.zh-cn: 苹果公司开发的移动操作系统。
description.en: A mobile operating system developed by Apple Inc.

en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关的组成人员。
description.en: Members of the highest state organ of power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一种为节约能源而人为规定地方时间的制度。
description.en: A system of artificially adjusting local time to save energy.

description.zh-cn: 中国夏时制的最早提议者。
description.en: The earliest proposer of daylight saving time in China.

en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China
General Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 北京时间是中国大陆的标准时间。
description.en: Beijing Time is the standard time for Mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 北京时间定义为UTC+8，比世界协调时快八小时。
description.en: Beijing Time is defined as UTC+8, which is 8 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

description.zh-cn: 北京时间以东经120度的地方平太阳时为基准。
description.en: Beijing Time is based on the local mean solar time at the 120th meridian east.

relationships.source: 中国科学院国家授时中心

description.zh-cn: 通过其原子钟组精密计算和比对来生成和发布北京时间。
description.en: Generates and disseminates Beijing Time through precise calculation and comparison of its atomic clock ensembles.

description.zh-cn: 1902年，清朝海关制定海岸时，以东经120度之时刻为标准。
description.en: In 1902, the Qing dynasty customs established a coast time standard based on the time at the 120th meridian east.

description.zh-cn: 1912年中华民国建立后，将全国划分为五个时区。
description.en: After the establishment of the Republic of China in 1912, it divided the country into five time zones.

description.zh-cn: 召开标准时间会议，确认了1912年划分的五个时区为中国标准时区。
description.en: Convened a conference on standard time and confirmed the five time zones established in 1912 as the standard time zones of China.

description.zh-cn: 决定自1947年4月1日起，东北解放区统一实行东经120度上海时间（即后来的北京时间）。
description.en: Decided that from April 1, 1947, the Northeast Liberated Area would uniformly adopt the Shanghai time of 120th meridian east (which later became Beijing Time).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，正式将UTC+8时区命名为北京时间，并在全国范围内推行单一时区。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, the UTC+8 time zone was officially named Beijing Time, and a single time zone was implemented nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 宣布电台时间一律以北京时间为准。
description.en: Announced that the station's time would be based on Beijing Time.

description.zh-cn: 通知全市自1949年11月3日起改用北京时间。
description.en: Notified the entire city to switch to Beijing Time starting from November 3, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 通知全市自1949年11月3日起停用陇蜀时间。
description.en: Notified the entire city to stop using the Longshu Time Zone starting from November 3, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 于1949年12月27日进驻成都后，宣布改用北京时间。
description.en: After entering Chengdu on December 27, 1949, announced the switch to Beijing Time.

description.zh-cn: 废除了中华民国时期的多时区划分，逐步在全国推行统一的北京时间。
description.en: Abolished the multi-time zone system of the Republic of China era and gradually implemented a unified Beijing Time across the country.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆，由于统一采用北京时间，导致政府和部分民众的作息时间通常会比东部地区延后2小时，以适应当地的日照情况。
description.en: In Xinjiang, the uniform use of Beijing Time leads to government and some public schedules being typically delayed by 2 hours compared to eastern regions to align with local daylight conditions.

description.zh-cn: 1986年2月，批准新疆维吾尔自治区实行新疆时间（UTC+6），主要用于民用作息，但此方案未完全实施。
description.en: In February 1986, it approved the implementation of Xinjiang Time (UTC+6) in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, primarily for civilian schedules, though this plan was not fully implemented.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆的维吾尔族等民族的民众中，普遍在日常生活中使用新疆时间（乌鲁木齐时间）。
description.en: Among the Uyghur and other ethnic groups in Xinjiang, Xinjiang Time (Ürümqi Time) is commonly used in daily life.

description.zh-cn: 在新疆的大部分汉族人因工作等因素采用北京时间。
description.en: Most Han Chinese people in Xinjiang use Beijing Time due to work and other factors.

description.zh-cn: 当用户定位在乌鲁木齐时，iOS 8系统会自动显示为UTC+6的新疆时间。
description.en: When a user's location is set to Ürümqi, the iOS 8 system automatically displays the time as UTC+6, which is Xinjiang Time.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会代表

description.zh-cn: 在2005年两会期间，一些代表提出将中国时区进行细分的建议。
description.en: During the Two Sessions in 2005, some deputies proposed to subdivide China's time zones.

description.zh-cn: 最早提出在中国实行夏令时间的建议。
description.en: Was the first to propose the implementation of daylight saving time in China.

description.zh-cn: 1986年4月，与国务院办公厅联合发出《在全国范围内实行夏时制的通知》。
description.en: In April 1986, jointly issued the 'Notice on the Implementation of Daylight Saving Time Nationwide' with the General Office of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1986年4月，与中共中央办公厅联合发出《在全国范围内实行夏时制的通知》。
description.en: In April 1986, jointly issued the 'Notice on the Implementation of Daylight Saving Time Nationwide' with the General Office of the Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在1986年至1991年间，在全国范围实行了六年夏时制。
description.en: Implemented daylight saving time nationwide for six years from 1986 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 发文宣布自1992年起暂停实行夏时制，此后未再恢复。
description.en: Issued a document announcing the suspension of daylight saving time from 1992, and it has not been resumed since.
